rooms.description: Wide entrance hall with Mediterranean tile accents and natural stone finishes.
Spacious living room featuring Mediterranean decor, large windows for natural light, open-plan design connecting to the kitchen and central courtyard.
Modern Mediterranean style kitchen with an island counter and open ventilation system; integrates seamlessly with the dining area.
Open central courtyard designed for natural light, ventilation, and relaxation, featuring water features and Mediterranean landscaping.

openings.description: Mediterranean styled front door with glass accents to enhance natural lighting.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in the living room for maximum natural light and ventilation.
Skylight above courtyard to enhance ambient light during daytime.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with Mediterranean decor, built-in storage, and large windows for natural lighting.
Modern ensuite bathroom featuring water-efficient fixtures, natural stone accents, and Mediterranean tiles.
Dedicated home theater space with acoustic design for optimal sound insulation and comfortable seating arrangement, integrated within a multi-purpose living area.

openings.description: Large windows in the master bedroom to facilitate natural light and maintain Vastu alignment.
Soundproof door connecting the home theater with other rooms.

rooms.description: Extensive Mediterranean styled terrace offering panoramic views, outdoor seating, and natural lighting. Incorporates privacy screens in line with Vastu principles.

openings.description: Stylish staircase leading from the first floor to the rooftop terrace, ensuring seamless connectivity and natural flow.
